title: My leaverbuster timer is glitched

embed.description: Image 39 E37 D6 EC3 D4 CB458 DAE70 BB88 A1 AA562 A39 A19370 E02 B86 BC pimgpsh thumbnail win distr hosted in imgbb.com

body: My leaver buster timer is glitched and it never stops,it keeps on going up and is really starting to piss me off I have no idea how to fix it so I need help

replies.body: It's unfortunately a global issue at the moment. They're actively working on a fix, but last I heard it's probably slow going. I'm afraid you'll just have to be patient. I gather it works properly sometimes, so if you really want to play League then I reckon the best thing you can probably do at the moment is turn it on and do something else while you wait through the possibly multiple timers.

That keeps on happening to me too. I really hate Leaver buster. Riot needs to fix this. I want them to focus a patch on Leaver buster specifically. It's really annoying. All i want to do is play. I shouldn't even have Leaver buster. I couldn't even get into the game because of lag. I wish they had a way to detect when its because of internet...

They do, but someone could just as easily turn off their router to spoof an internet failure to avoid punishment. Abuse cases aside, disconnections, no matter how innocent still negatively affect the rest of the players in that game, so if it's happening a lot, you have to accept that you will also face consequences, for the effect it has on those players.

Sometimes all it takes is a phone call to your ISP threatening to leave to get issues magically sorted out.
